what: Load Columbia County HUC12 watersheds layer from Geoserver
title: nrcs-practices
code: columbia_huc12_url <- "http://142.93.92.104:8080/geoserver/Columbia/ows?service=WFS&version=1.0.0&request=GetFeature&typeName=Columbia:all_columbia_huc_12s&outputFormat=application/json"  # Convert GeoJSON to an sf object # drop geometry, we only need watershed names here columbia_huc12s <- geojson_sf(columbia_huc12_url) %>%     sf::st_drop_geometry() %>%     distinct(hc12_name,huc12)

title: nrcs-practices
text: Dataset provided SCC many unique watersheds file? Warning: Practice code 430 > 1 practice names .
code: data_path <- system.file("extdata", "20040101-20240430 NRCS Practices_edited_v3.xlsx", package = "middlesnake")  nrcs_data <- readxl::read_xlsx(data_path) %>%   janitor::clean_names() nrcs_data %>%     pull(huc12) %>%     unique() %>%     length() #> [1] 1289 nrcs_data %>%     cnt(practice_code,n_distinct_vars = practice_name) %>%     filter(n_practice_name>1) #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   practice_code n_practice_name     n n_cumulative #>   <chr>                   <int> <int>        <int> #> 1 430                         2  1106       105975 nrcs_data %>%     filter(practice_code==430) %>%     distinct(practice_name) #> # A tibble: 2 × 1 #>   practice_name               #>   <chr>                       #> 1 Irrigation Pipeline         #> 2 Irrigation Water Conveyance
